languages.text: Культ Последнего восхода отравил запасы воды в колонии — выпившие ее начинают мутировать с ужасной скоростью.
The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.
languages.original_text: Культ Последнего восхода отравил запасы воды в колонии — выпившие ее начинают мутировать с ужасной скоростью.

traits.locale_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating with frightening speed.
The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.

languages.text: Le Culte de l'Aube finale a empoisonné les sources d'eau de la colonie. Quiconque boit l'eau contaminée se met à muter à une vitesse effroyable.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.

traits.locale_text: Le Culte de l'Aube finale a empoisonné les sources d'eau de la colonie. Quiconque boit l'eau contaminée se met à muter à une vitesse effroyable.

languages.text: 最後の夜明け魔女団がコロニーの水源を汚染した。汚染された水源から水を飲んだ者は皆、恐ろしい速さで突然変異を起こした。
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.

traits.locale_text: 最後の夜明け魔女団がコロニーの水源を汚染した。汚染された水源から水を飲んだ者は皆、恐ろしい速さで突然変異を起こした。

languages.text: 终末黎明教派污染了殖民地的水源，所有饮用了污染水的人都以可怕的速度发生了变异。
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.

traits.locale_text: 终末黎明教派污染了殖民地的水源，所有饮用了污染水的人都以可怕的速度发生了变异。

languages.text: El Culto del Amanecer Final ha envenenado las reservas de agua de la colonia. Quienes beben del líquido mancillado mutan a un ritmo vertiginoso.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.

traits.locale_text: El Culto del Amanecer Final ha envenenado las reservas de agua de la colonia. Quienes beben del líquido mancillado mutan a un ritmo vertiginoso.

languages.text: Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat die Wasservorräte der Kolonie vergiftet — jeder, der aus den vergifteten Quellen trinkt, beginnt in furchterregender Geschwindigkeit zu mutieren.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.

traits.locale_text: Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat die Wasservorräte der Kolonie vergiftet — jeder, der aus den vergifteten Quellen trinkt, beginnt in furchterregender Geschwindigkeit zu mutieren.

languages.text: Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, koloninin su kaynaklarını zehirledi. Kirli kaynaklardan su içenler, korkunç bir hızla mutasyon geçirmeye başlıyor.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources start mutating at frightening speed.
